articles.title: Company Law Committee may consider stronger regulations for bigger unlisted firms: Sources - Moneycontrol
articles.description: The latest move is triggered by irregularities at the ed-tech firm Byju’s where auditors resigned.
articles.content: Company Law Committee is likely to consider stronger regulations for bigger unlisted companies, CNBC-TV 18 reported on September 25 citing sources. The report also mentions that committee is consider… [+1695 chars]
